About Me

Shyaman Jayasundara

I am a computer engineering undergraduate talented in developing embedded systems and passionate about Artificial intelligence, machine learning. Apart from that I use my camera to capture the moments in life through visual story, giving people a chance to see the way I am looking at the world. So photography is my hobby and passion.
